reviews.review: Great comic book action that really lives up to the hype of being the climax of 10 years of the MCU.  It might be a little confusing if you haven't seen most of the Marvel movies leading up to this one, but the funny moments, great action, and excellent character moments should still translate through.  Definitely worth seeing on the big screen. Don't miss out!
I really loved the unexpectations. Even that I saw spoilers, the movie was really changing what I was expecting.
One of the few movies that lives up to the hype and defiantly one of the best movies I have ever seen.
Not my kind of movie. There was way too much going on and the humorous parts were so corny. I loved Black Panther and Captain America, but this was over the top and too hard to follow!
An amazing culmination of multiple films. Worth a second theatre watch.
What a visual masterpiece! I am not a big Marvel fan, but even I was freaking out with joy when my favorite team started to assemble.

The movie can pass horror and emotion together with humour. The boldest, riskiest, and darkest movie ever made. Pure shock and somehow a disbelief. Plot twist that'll leave you genuinely fearful, frustrated, enraged and emotionally challenged. This movie literally made me speechless. This movie couldn't be made better. Hats off to all.
Watched twice. So what do u think? Lol. But some exciting characters didn’t get much time to shine. So that’s a shame.

This film was a roller-coaster all the way through, but that is also one of its greatest flaws. Josh Brolin as Thanos shines in a role expanded upon in three minor appearances with no slowing for an unneeded introduction as well as a tragic backstory and inspired acting. The usual with the actors, all doing their best to hold up this spectacular movie. The new guys in the film all do pretty well, with the four side villains all threatening despite no character development. The two others (no spoilers) are exciting in what they may provide for upcoming films, with the possibilities ever expanding. The main flaws in this film come from a lack of screen time for some characters who really needed it and too much focus on those who didn't. Also, no Hawkeye or Ant-Man. So, watch this film and get excited for what Avengers 4 may bring. In the end, this is the second best Avengers film, second best Guardians film, second best Spider-Man Film, third best Thor film, and best Thanos film we may ever get.
